001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
004import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
005import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionInput;
006import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
007import org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptBuilder;
008import org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptException;
009
010/**
011 * Utility for transaction validation
012 */
013public class TransactionVerification {
014    /**
015     * Verify that a transaction correctly spends the input specified by index. Throws {@link ScriptException}
016     * if verification fails.
017     *
018     * @param tx The transaction to verify
019     * @param inputIndex The input to verify
020     * @param fromAddr The address we are trying to spend funds from
021     * @throws ScriptException If {@code scriptSig#correctlySpends} fails with exception
022     */
023    public static void correctlySpendsInput(Transaction tx, int inputIndex, Address fromAddr) throws ScriptException {
024        correctlySpendsInput(tx, inputIndex, ScriptBuilder.createOutputScript(fromAddr));
025    }
026
027    /**
028     * Verify that a transaction correctly spends the input specified by index. Throws {@link ScriptException}
029     * if verification fails.
030     *
031     * @param tx The transaction to verify
032     * @param inputIndex The input to verify
033     * @param scriptPubKey The script we are trying to spend
034     * @throws ScriptException If {@code scriptSig#correctlySpends} fails with exception
035     */
036    public static void correctlySpendsInput(Transaction tx, int inputIndex, Script scriptPubKey) throws ScriptException {
037        TransactionInput input = tx.getInputs().get(inputIndex);
038        input.getScriptSig()
039                    .correctlySpends(tx, inputIndex, input.getWitness(), input.getValue(), scriptPubKey, Script.ALL_VERIFY_FLAGS);
040    }
041}
